channel.title: Vandalism on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Vandalism on The Majority

item.title: Kelvingrove Park statues vandalised with graffiti
item.description:
https://www.glasgowlive.co.uk/news/glasgow-news/kelvingrove-park-statues-vandalised-graffiti-18380595

Glasgow Live reports:

Two statues in Kelvingrove Park have been vandalised with graffiti.

Both the Boer War memorial and Thomas Carlyle statue have both been defaced in the west end park.

On the Boer memorial, ‘BLM ACAB’ (Black Lives Matter, All cops are b***s) has been sprayed, while on the Caryle statue it says: “F THE POLIS”.

item.title: Conservative MSP Glasgow office vandalised with 'ACAB' & 'F*** the Tories' graffiti
item.description:
https://www.thescottishsun.co.uk/news/5676958/conservative-msps-annie-wells-adam-tomkins-office-vandalised/

The Scottish Sun reports: CONSERVATIVE MSPs Annie Wells and Adam Tomkins’ shared Glasgow office was vandalised with ‘ACAB’ and ‘F*** the Tories’ graffiti.

https://twitter.com/AnnieWellsMSP/status/1269658544909037573
